 'Coco' Continues to Push Toward $70M+ Five-Day Opening 
 by Brad Brevet 
 Nov. 22  - 
 Updated with Friday estimates...  One look at the  Thanksgiving opening weekend records  shows how important the holiday has been to Disney, which currently holds nine of the top ten  three-day  and  five-day opening weekend records . This weekend the studio debuts the latest Pixar feature,  Coco , which has already become the largest single release in Mexico and looks to make an impact domestically this weekend.
 October 2017 Box Office Returned to the Year's Downward Trend
